kiss on the mouth? that sounds a little false... (saying this, as my dad (who somehow is still kicking) played (or prolly just collected the cards for) Magic the Gathering) I'm pretty sure that wouldn't be the case.
if it WAS a joke, uh... look in my bio...
@siltyloamprincess.bsky.social I need to beat you in a comp rel tournament before I move pleasepleasepleasepleasepleasepleaseplease
you have to beat them BAD ENOUGH don't forget
if I have one thing on this earth that I am the best at it is grinding that beautiful boy into a fine powder in a match of Legacy
plz no more wights or endurances 😭

I'm fucking dead
I need to find one of these regular competitive tournaments. Because I suck at MTG.

Ah yes, of course, the Cheatyface exception.
nile
oh shit I'm switching formats
I need to look into that low level REL.

This is literally why I quit playing. A Level 1 judge threw a fit and publically called me out for using sideboard notes between games at a FNM. I was like... bro, it's OK this REL and you know it, lay off. That's when I realized how toxic that community can be, and never played again. 😢
Had to kiss a lot of folk on the mouth back in my day. Let me tell you, just because they're Pros doesn't mean they brush or floss.
doesn't that always apply in every game and sports ever; it's only cheating if you're caught

Get caught but too late 
Its then not classed as cheating
Play on non cheater

author.displayName: from the river to the sea

record.text: Its true

You're always allowed to cheat. 

So long as you're not caught.

Taxes, marriage, Monopoly, 10k's, and many more. All fair game. Just don't get caught.
Rules are rules
